unnormalised: New Delhi Grapples with Deteriorating Air Quality Post-Diwali Celebrations
normalised: New Delhi Grapples with Deteriorating Air Quality Post-Diwali Celebrations

unnormalised: New Delhi – Air quality across the National Capital Territory has plummeted to ‘severe’ levels following Diwali celebrations, prompting renewed concerns from environmental agencies. The Central Pollution Control Board (CPCB) recorded an Air Quality Index (AQI) exceeding 450 in several areas, particularly near cracker-prone localities like Lajpat Nagar and R.K. Puram.
normalised: New Delhi – Air quality across the National Capital Territory has plummeted to ‘severe’ levels following Diwali celebrations, prompting renewed concerns from environmental agencies. The C P C B recorded an Air Quality Index (A Q I) exceeding four hundred and fifty in several areas, particularly near cracker-prone localities like Lajpat Nagar and R K Puram.

unnormalised: The spike is attributed to the widespread bursting of firecrackers, despite existing regulations and public awareness campaigns. Doctors are reporting a surge in respiratory ailments, especially among children and the elderly.
normalised: The spike is attributed to the widespread bursting of firecrackers, despite existing regulations and public awareness campaigns. Doctors are reporting a surge in respiratory ailments, especially among children and the elderly.

unnormalised: The Delhi Government has announced stringent measures, including increased water sprinkling and a temporary ban on construction activities. Environmental activist groups are calling for a more sustainable approach to festival celebrations, suggesting alternatives like community LED displays instead of firecrackers. "We need to rethink how we celebrate our festivals," stated Ms. Sharma from Paryavaran Suraksha Samiti. "Enjoying biryani with loved ones is a far healthier and sustainable way to celebrate than polluting our air." Further monitoring continues to assess long-term health impacts. Rs. 10,000 fine will be imposed on any violation.
